dublin_core.dcvalue: Northern Norwegian Health Net the Net is a closed network for social and health care institutions in North Norway In its present form it was established in 2000 but the early start was in the late 1980s This proceeding will give a brief history of the network description of the technology used and the services offered It also gives a summary of experiences with the Net and research conducted on the services Most health care institutions in the region are connected in the Net and the usage is increasing
Studies in health technology and informatics
